Title: Provides for the issuance of free hunting, fishing and trapping licenses to members of the Seneca nation who reside in the state
Summary: Provides for the issuance of free hunting, fishing and trapping licenses to members of the Seneca nation who reside in the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the issuance of free hunting, fishing and trapping licenses to members of the Seneca nation
